title: Message to President Chiang Chung-cheng on China's Independence Day.
text:
MY FELLOW CITIZENS join with me in extending to Your Excellency cordial greetings on this auspicious anniversary. We earnestly desire for your country the blessings of peace and prosperity.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency, Chiang Chung-cheng, President of the National Government of the Republic of China, Nanking, China]
